ApproxsimClient.map
Class MapLine

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.map.MapLine

public class MapLine
extends Object

Represents a ordinary (straight) line.

intersects

public boolean intersects(MapLine line,
                          Projection projection)
Checks if this line intersects another line. Both lines are projected with the actual projection before the test is performed.

Parameters:
line - the line to be tested.
projection - the actual projection.
Returns:
true if the lines intersect, false otherwise.
